Plot: A cattle herder and his family who reside in the dunes of Timbuktu find their quiet lives -- which are typically free of the Jihadists determined to control their faith -- abruptly disturbed.
Title: Timbuktu
Actors: Ibrahim Ahmed, Abel Jafri, Toulou Kiki, Layla Walet Mohamed
tomatoConsensus: Gracefully assembled and ultimately disquieting, Timbuktu is a timely film with a powerful message.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 24 wins & 16 nominations.
Language: Arabic, Songhay, English, Bambara, French, Tamashek
